title: 13 Flowers Foods bakeries attain 2022 ENERGY STAR certification - Snack Food & Wholesale Bakery
summary: Thirteen Flowers Foods, Inc. bakeries earned the 2022 ENERGY STAR Certification for superior energy efficiency. The company seeks opportunities to improve operational energy efficiency, especially when upgrading equipment or installing new lines. The certification was achieved through energy efficiency initiatives which include LED lighting, compressed air upgrades, and heat recovery projects.

title: Czechia refills rooftop PV rebate pot – pv magazine International - pv magazine International
summary: The Czech Ministry of the Environment has secured new funds from the European Union for its New Green Savings program. The program aims to cut red tape and bring more households into the program from September, with a focus on rooftop solar and heat pumps. Despite the program's success, grid bottlenecks and long waiting times for PV connections remain challenges.
